column5: As I rolled into the house this morning after work I was greeted by my wife who reminded me she was off for the day.  Usually theres a quick hello/briefing on what the kids had planned for the day, groceries needed, house work requiring my immediate attention etc.... you get the picture. But not today! Roe bags were hastily tied, shotgun cased, ammo picked, dog prepped for hunting and we were off. I Got to fish with 'Rookie" my yellow lab who up until today only understood hunting, fishing was a relaxing transition for him though and not one float was retrieved ;-)  After a few hours and a few fish we decided we'd pack up and head to a local marsh that had produced ducks earier in the week. Unfortunately my shooting was not as sharp as my hook sets  today as I missed a couple of nice wood ducks that should of been marinating in my fridge as I typed this and whats worse is the look of disgust on the dogs face after a clean miss, Its almost unbearable LOL.     Can't wait to do it again next week !!!
Beautiful dog, love the picture of him "on watch". Reminds me of "Major" my first Lab, also a yellow. I still miss him.
You weekday anglers and hunters.LOL  Nice pup bud.
I know that look! LOL  Looks like a great day!  S.
Awesome pup.  Hopefully you'll get another crack at the ducks again this year
Id love to train my pup to retrieve but i think hes a bit too energetic for the watch portion. he loves fishing though and even likes trying to hook himself a lot!  What a day though, nice fish!
Ryan ,did you not have a darker dog before?,sorry if I missed the post.Looks like a fine dog,and a nice catch as well!!!!Maybe you have two dogs looking back.
Nice when you get the "all clear" and she really means it.
I didn't sting any fish in the section you frequent ;-)   You cant fool me. I know that fish.LOL

Oops, I really think mine does... sometimes. I'm planning a blast and cast for next weekend right now. She's at the Leafs game in a private box and I'm wearing a plastic tiara while hunting ghosts in the basement.
.[/ Nope your right, I had a GSP also. Good memory . Ry
